CatDescriptText: Charles Rosemond, 206 Henning Place, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 31, 1958, pg. A1 question reads: "Do you think people follow political leadership more than religious leadership? Why?" answer reads: "The minister does, because more people listen to him nowadays.  The people are returning to religion."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Charles Rosemond wearing light colored fedora with dark band and dark necktie with small pattern and clip, holding paper bag and cigarette, standing on corner of Fifth and Liberty Avenues, May Building with Thrift Drugs in background, Downtown
